definition: Bailu or White Dew, 15th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd September
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Many Chinese believe that the best food during White Dew is sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 很多中国人认为，白露时节最好的食物是红薯。

sentences.english: Because of the millennium cold residual petals.
The reeds and rushes are abundant , And the white dew is not yet ceased .
sentences.chinese: 芦苇采采多么富饶，晶莹的白露没有晒干。
